channel.title: [317] Need help adding custom items to server [317]
channel.description: I just need someone to team view me and help me add my 317 custom items to my server please comment or pm me thanks and if you can help i will make you a moderator on my server :)

item.title: [317] Need help adding custom items to server [317]
item.dc:creator: @avirunes avirunes
item.description:
@avirunes wrote:

Belongs in client help http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,138.0.html . And its pretty simple but varies from client to client. Generally you can just grab the .dat of a model and chuck it in your raw folder, or if its a gzip in the model folder then type model, and the modelname that its labelled (ie 333.gzip) and it will extract it if you have that command in your client otherwise you can just extract it manually. Then you just need to add the ints which is the part that varies from client to client. Depending on what client you have you need to chuck the ints in something like itemdef/itemdef2/class8 and make sure the ints are the right type (ie if your client has class8 make sure the ints are class8.xxx rather than itemdef.xxxx otherwise you’ll need to convert them or create new ones).

Read full topic
item.source: [317] Need help adding custom items to server [317]
